text: Jean Baptiste Xavier Joseph Guillaume Wasseige (21 March 1762 â€“ 18 June 1823) was a Dutch politician from Namur, that was at the time of his birth a city within Habsburg Netherlands (now Belgium). In the United Kingdom of the Netherlands he served for Namur as a member of the 1815 Assemblee of notables and as a member of the House of Representatives of the Netherlands from 1815 to 1818. Wasseige died in Namur on 18 June 1823, at the age of 61. ==References== Category:1762 births Category:1823 deaths Category:Dutch politicians Category:People from Namur (city) Category:Members of the House of Representatives of the Netherlands
title: Xavier Wasseige
